1.Title: Ingenious Craft
1.Description: Upon launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the equipper's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> for 12s. Additionally, if the target's current HP is below 50% of their Max HP, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>.
